name: Click-and--share-
body:
## Welcome to the click and share  Project!

click and  share is a  social network that help people to  connect diferent people  they are interested in    

************************
Click and share is currently  getting  modified by the  Moderator and admin 
************************

With Click and share you can:

- Discover and  make  new  friends and share amazing things you are interested at  

Documentation is available on our [wiki](https://github.com/clickandshare/clickandshre /wiki)

## Quick Start:

Here's how you can get a development environment up and running. You can check out system-specific guides [here](https://github.com/Clickandshare/Clickandshare/wiki/Installation-Guides).

### Step 1: Clone the repo 
```git clone git@github.com:clickandshare/clickandshare.git
```

### Step 2: Navigate to your cloned repository
```cd ../clickandshare
```

### Step 3: Install Bundler and gems (depending on [OS Vendor](https://github.com/clickandshare/clickandshare/wiki/Installation-Guides))
```sudo gem install bundler && sudo bundle install
```

### Step 4: Edit database.yml, and rename application.yml.example to just application.yml 

### Step 5: Create and migrate the database
```rake db:create && rake db:migrate
```

### Step 6: Start the test server
```rails s
```

## Resources:

- [Wiki](https://github.com/clickshare/Click-and--share.git)
